title: Microsoft Advertising SDK for Windows 8 (Xaml) could not be found.
body: I have built an app that targets Windows 8 and the customer is looking for a servicing fix on Windows 8. I have got the fix ready, but in order to produce a fix I need to be able to compile with the Microsoft Advertising SDK for Windows 8 (Xaml). Is there anywhere I can find a copy and download it?
